name: Galaxis Online
description:
Skipper keep your eyes glued, If it so much moves I need it taken out. Our defenses might not hold out for long, but we sure aint going to go down without a fight.

-

An updated version of the original Galaxis for PC  with manual firing, updated sound effects, and a power force fields to keep them pesky Aliens out.

The gameplay was designed using Text base Ascii

Instructions for mobile controls is on the Screenshots provided

Keyboard users can use L/R and and Pg Dn
